div.l: As on 71r, a different, probably later hand re-copies line 330 in the upper right margin; that line is marked out.I wil go crepe in be my felawe
And fond the cradil · with his hand anon
Bi god thought he· alwrong I have mysgon
Myn hed is toty · of my swynk to nyght
That makis me · that I go nat aright
I wote bi the cradil ·I have mysgoo
Here lith the Miller · and his wif also
Vnto the bedde · ther as the Miller lay
To it he went · a twenty devil way
He wend to have crope in bi his felaw Iohn
And bi the Miller · in he crept anon
And caught hym bi the nek · and soft spak
He saide thow Iohn thow swyneshed a wak
For Cristes sowle · and here a noble game
For bi that lord · that callid is Seynt Iame
As I have thryes · in this short nyght
Swyved the Miller doughter bolt vpright
While thow as a coward · hast bien agast
Ye harlot quod this Miller hast
A false traytour clerk quod he
Thou shalt be ded · bi goddis dignite
How durisstowdisstowdurstow be so bold · to disparage
My doughter that is come · of suche lynage
And bi the throte bolle · he caught Alayn
And he hym hent · dispitously agayn
And on the nose · he smote hym with his fist
Doun̄ ranne the bloody streame · vpon his brist
And on the floore · with nose and mowth I broke
They walooen as don · two pigges in a poke
